ingredients: 1 red chilli deseeded and finely chopped (optional)
20g fresh ginger peeled and finely chopped
1 large red pepper deseeded and roughly chopped
30g coriander stems and leaves separated and chopped
2 tbsp of capers in brine or vinegar
600g shoulder or leg of mutton, goat or hogget
8 large merguez or spicy lamb sausages
700g of mixed game meat (partridge, pigeon, pheasant, rabbit and hare are good options here)
700g of beef shin, featherblade or stewing steak
4 x 75g/3oz herring fillets or 4 x 225g/8oz herrings
350g Jerusalem artichokes or 4 leeks (fat ones are better than longer skinny ones in both cases)
handful fresh basil or 75g of parsley, chopped and stems removed
1½kg shin of beef or stewing beef, cut into cubes
icing sugar and syrup of choice (we like date syrup), to serve
300g pack venison sausages (about 6 sausages), removed from their skins
½ tsp asafoetida powder or 3 garlic cloves, finely sliced
250g pack prepared veg, broccoli carrots and green beans
